title: similar to Folio
content:
Does anyone know this font? It’s similar to folio. One of the differences is that the I dot in Folio is square instead of round.

I’m pretty sure the “V” has been tweaked a little.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015170111im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Untitled-3_6320.jpg)

Thanks,  
Jeremy

 [‹ Star Trek Teaser Trailer Font](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015170111/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44829 "Go to previous forum topic") [Interactive VCR menu ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015170111/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44898 "Go to next forum topic")
author: adpressinc

comments.content: It’s a mix and mod of various [Chalet](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015170111/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=4) fonts.
